english.segment1: I talk, I talk too much. I never open up. To what You need to say. My words get in the way
english.segment2: I search for stillness. But worry kills it. I need to clear my head. I'm tired, I need to rest
english.segment3: It all comes down to this. The quiet in the end. I listen for Your voice. Recovery begins
english.segment4: The times I hear You most. Are when You bring me close. I'll follow as You guide. While darkness turns to light
english.segment5: Whisper to me, whisper to me. Whisper to me, whisper to me
